name: LubaButton
description: Versatile button with multiple styles, sizes, loading states, and icon support. Supports both built-in enum styles and custom LubaButtonStyling protocol conformances.

parameters.name: fullWidth
parameters.description: Override full-width behavior (primary/destructive default to full-width)

notes: Also supports custom styles via `LubaButton("Save", styling: MyCustomStyle()) { }` using the LubaButtonStyling protocol.

name: LubaCard
description: Container component with elevation shadows, multiple visual styles, and configurable corners/padding.
notes: Shadow strengthens 1.5x in dark mode. Glass style applies .lubaGlass() modifier.

name: LubaTextField
description: Text input with floating label, validation states, helper text, icons, clear button, and secure entry support.

parameters.name: showClearButton
parameters.description: Shows clear button when text present

notes: Convenience inits: .secure() for passwords, .email() for email fields. Min height 48pt.

name: LubaTextArea
description: Multi-line text input with floating label, character counter, and auto-growing height.
notes: Uses TextEditor internally. Shares field state pattern with LubaTextField.

name: LubaSearchBar
description: Search input with search icon, cancel button, and clear functionality.
notes: Height 40pt (compact, distinct from TextField's 48pt). Capsule shape with surfaceSecondary background.

name: LubaCheckbox
description: Checkbox with optional label and haptic feedback.
example: LubaCheckbox(isChecked: $agreed, label: "I agree to the terms")
notes: 20pt control size, 4pt corner radius, checkmark animates on toggle.

name: LubaRadio
description: Radio button group for single selection among options.
notes: Use LubaRadioGroup for the full group. LubaRadioButton / LubaRadio for individual items.

name: LubaToggle
description: Toggle switch with optional label and haptic feedback.
notes: Track: 48x28pt, thumb: 24pt. Uses accent color when on, gray200 when off.

name: LubaSlider
description: Slider with optional label, value display, and step increments.
example:
LubaSlider(value: $volume, in: 0...100, step: 1,
    label: "Volume", showValue: true)
notes: Track height 4pt, thumb 22pt with border and shadow. Thumb scales to 1.1x while dragging.

name: LubaStepper
description: Stepper with minus/plus buttons and value display.
notes: 44pt touch targets. Capsule shape. Haptic feedback on increment/decrement.

name: LubaRating
description: Star rating input with configurable max stars.
notes: Star size 28pt, touch target 36pt. Filled stars use accent color.

name: LubaTabs
description: Segmented tab control with optional icons and glass style.

parameters.name: tabs
parameters.description: Tab items with optional SF Symbol icons

parameters.name: useGlass
parameters.description: Glass effect for selected tab indicator

example:
LubaTabs(selection: $selectedTab, tabs: [
    (value: 0, label: "All", icon: nil),
    (value: 1, label: "Active", icon: "circle.fill"),
    (value: 2, label: "Done", icon: "checkmark")
])
notes: Also available: LubaUnderlineTabs for underline-style tabs (no glass, no icons). Tab height 32pt (segmented), 44pt (underline).

name: LubaToast
description: Non-intrusive notification bar with icon, message, optional action button, and glass variant.

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: Visual style with icon and color

notes: Use .lubaToast() modifier for auto-presenting/dismissing (default 3s). Direct LubaToast view for inline display.

name: LubaAlert
description: Inline alert banner with icon, title, message, and optional dismiss button.
example:
LubaAlert("Please check your input", style: .warning, title: "Validation Error",
    isDismissible: true) { hideAlert() }
notes: Rounded rectangle with semantic icon and color. Each style has icon, color, and backgroundColor.

name: LubaProgress
description: Progress indicators: linear bar and circular ring with optional labels.
notes: LubaProgressBar for linear, LubaCircularProgress for circular. Bar height 6pt. Circular default size 64pt.

name: LubaSpinner
description: Loading spinner with multiple animation styles.
notes: Arc: rotating arc trim. Pulse: scaling circle. Dots: bouncing dots. Breathe: breathing scale+opacity.

name: LubaSkeleton
description: Skeleton loading placeholders with shimmer animation.
notes: Variants: LubaSkeleton, LubaSkeletonCircle, LubaSkeletonText, LubaSkeletonCard, LubaSkeletonRow. Shimmer duration 1.5s.

name: LubaSheet
description: Bottom sheet with drag indicator, header, and size presets.
notes: Use .lubaSheet() modifier. Sizes: small 25%, medium 50%, large 75%, full. LubaSheetHeader supports useGlass parameter.

name: LubaAvatar
description: User avatar with image, initials, or name-generated initials.
notes: Three init variants: image, initials string, or full name (auto-extracts initials). Circular shape with surfaceSecondary background for placeholder.

name: LubaBadge
description: Inline label/badge with icon, color styles, and size variants.
notes: Capsule shape. Each style has foregroundColor and backgroundColor.

name: LubaDivider
description: Horizontal or vertical divider with optional center label.
notes: 1px line with border color. Label appears centered with spacing.

name: LubaIcon
description: SF Symbol icon with size tokens and optional color override.
notes: Also: LubaIconButton (tappable icon with 44pt touch target, press scale), LubaCircledIcon (icon in circle background with .filled/.subtle/.neutral styles).

name: LubaChip
description: Compact interactive chip with optional icon, selection state, and dismiss.
example:
LubaChip("Swift", style: .filled, icon: Image(systemName: "swift"),
    isSelected: true, onTap: { toggle() })
notes: Height 32pt, capsule shape. Selected state uses accent color.

name: LubaMenu
description: Dropdown menu with action items, icons, and destructive roles.
notes: LubaMenuItem roles: .normal, .destructive. Menu width min 200pt, item height 44pt. Uses SwiftUI Menu under the hood.

name: LubaTooltip
description: Contextual help popup that appears on tap with auto-dismiss.
notes: Max width 240pt, auto-dismiss after 3s. Scale+fade entrance animation. Available as component or .lubaTooltip() modifier.

name: LubaLink
description: Tappable text link with underline styles.
notes: Default uses accent color with underline. External appends arrow icon.
